headline.main: YUGOSLAV PATRIOTS SLASH NAZI FORCES; Eight Elite Divisions Harried in Anti-Invasion Moves

lead_paragraph: LONDON, July 1 (AP) -- Ever-active Yugoslav guerrillas have smashed an effort by eight Nazi divisions to clear the way for a stand against a possible Allied invasion of the Balkans and have stripped to half its might the Prinz Eugen Division of the German Elite Guard, Yugoslav sources said today.
abstract: Yugoslav guerrillas harry Ger anti-invasion moves
